section2.name: Niklas
section2.ageDescription: I am 19 years old. I have always been very interested in technology and how software works. In my second year of high school, I picked up programming and started coding games in Unity, and then various small projects for my own use. This has led to my current love for programming, problem-solving, and being creative.
section2.hobbiesDescription1: In my free time, I play and coach
section2.hobbiesDescription4: . I also love being creative by writing

history.title: History and Experience
history.bsc: Current student in the Computer Science program at University of Copenhagen. Pursuing my dream of becoming a software developer.
history.highschoolDescription: In 2023, I graduated from high school. After that, I was ready to start university immediately and really gain experience in software development.
history.selftaughtDescription: Started developing small Unity games and taught myself to code in C#. This was the beginning of my interest in software development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.information: Information about all projects can be found on GitHub

project1.name: FastPost
project1.description: FastPost is a python script that can automatically post instagram reels and youtube shorts.

project2.name: Breakout
project2.description: Our version of the classic game of breakout, made in C#. It's been thoroughly tested and designed with design patterns in mind.
